com.umeng.common.ui.activities

类 BaseFragmentActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentActivity
      • com.umeng.common.ui.activities.BaseFragmentActivity
  • 直接已知子类:
    BaseTitleActivity, FeedDetailActivity, FeedsActivity, FindBaseActivity, LocationFeedActivity, MessageChatActivity, NewMsgBaseActivity, NotificationActivity, PostFeedActivity, RelativeUserActivity, SearchBaseActivity, SearchTopicBaseActivity, SettingActivity, TopicDetailBaseActivity, UserInfoBaseActivity

    public class BaseFragmentActivity
extends FragmentActivity
    继承自FragmentActivity的Activity类型, 封装了FragmentManager和去除了title

      • showFragmentInContainer

        public void showFragmentInContainer(int container,
                                    Fragment fragmentShow)
        将fragmentShow显示在一个新的container上,而不覆盖mFragmentContainer。 这种情况适用于Fragment中又嵌套Fragment
        参数:
        container -
        fragmentShow -
